item.description: A fast paced asymmetric top down rogue souls-like game with retro pixel graphics based off Celtic Mythology. Combat and Scene Change Dodging and Enemy Patroling Shop and Dialogue System Main Resting Area Tutorial Area White Boxing Main Area White Boxing

Glutender An educational game. This was designed to teach in a fun and interactive way what people with Gluten Intolerance can and cannot digest. Quick Tutorial Screen Card at top of deck Swipe Right for yes Swipe Left for no

Another rogue-like RPG this time in 2D where you control an apprentice mage who must learn every spell in the cave before going back into the world to save it from certain doom. Mouse Targeting System Enemy Patroling and Follow Object Interaction System Dialogue System
